Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total

#18 0' 2.1"
154.32 lbs. 		Sand Heap Pokémon It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth, to add to the accumulation of its sand-mound body. This Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Water Compaction 15 Blocks Water-type moves to sharply boost the Pokémon's Defense.
10 Lightning Rod 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
25 Heatproof 7 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
40 Sand Spit 46 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
55 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
70 Filter 44 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
85 Bulletproof 14 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
100 Singularity 83 The Pokémon aplifies the Gravitational field when it enters battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 04 Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 05 Immunity 2 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 20 Sand Force 52 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 34 Water Absorb 15 Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
Disc 42 Sand Stream 102 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
Disc 51 Cecity -20 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aftermath 2 Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
Bulletproof 14 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Contrary 81 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Cursed Body 2 May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Defeatist -17 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Drowsy Aura 31 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
Emergency Exit -29 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Filter 44 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Flawed Form -17 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Ghastly Guard 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Eerie Fog.
Heatproof 7 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Infiltrator 13 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -24 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Natural Cure 31 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Perish Body 2 When hit by a contact move, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns.
Predictable -15 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Sand Spit 46 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
Singularity 83 The Pokémon aplifies the Gravitational field when it enters battle.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -13 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Terralate 77 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Terrorize 77 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unearthly 254 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Attack stats when it enters battle.
Wandering Spirit 2 The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a contact move.
Water Compaction 15 Blocks Water-type moves to sharply boost the Pokémon's Defense.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
